name: Christmas' Matching for kids HD
description:
Christmas' Matching is a pair matching game with Christmas pictures and hilarious sound effects. With 3 levels of difficulty, this is a challenge for everybody.

With this game, your kids will improve their mind while having fun.

This game is part of our "Learning is fun" educational game collection, see our website for more info: http://ar-entertainment.net/learning/ipad.html
